caption.p: Effects of chronic unpredictable stress and intraperitoneal administration of essential oil of oregano (0.2 mL/kg) on TLR4 mRNA levels in the (A), hippocampus; and (B), the prefrontal. Each point represents mean Â± SEM. (n = 6). *, indicates significant ( P < 0.05) difference from control according to one-way analysis of variance. (OEO), oregano essential oil; (CUS), chronic unpredictable stress.
